headline: 1999 - Cholera in Brazil
main_text: The Ministry of Health has reported an outbreak of cholera in the municipality of Paranagua, Parana State. The cases occurred in the villages of Guarani and Araça. Up to 31 March, a total of 235 cases (205 confirmed) and 3 deaths had been reported. Strict investigative and control measures are being implemented, including inspection and training of food vendors and distribution of health education material.
